labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: It brings up the user overview card.
data.short_description: Checking "Hide Names" on a voice channel makes users non-clickable.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a voice channel on a server - Right-click on the channel's name - Click the "Hide Names" box to make sure it's checked - Click on any user in the voice channel
